channel.title: I need help with arrays
channel.description: when i try to add an object with a high id i log onto my server and it just keeps connecting me and disconnecting me over and over again then in the run.bat screen it says arrayoutofbounds how do i change the max amount of object ids?

item.title: I need help with arrays
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

How high is the ID? Is it over 2^32?

Also, that exception is being thrown because you’re accessing an array with an invalid index… i.e the index is higher than the actual length of the array.

Read full topic
